advancedSearchTipContent: Advanced search enables you to select a <bold>Search Field</bold>, a <bold>condition</bold> and enters search <bold>keywords</bold> to search with.<break/>You can combine a complex search query using Boolean Operators: <bold>AND, OR, NOT</bold>.<break/>You can enable the <bold>Fuzzy Search</bold> by entering <bold>~</bold> at the end of the search keyword.
allowSynonymsTipContent: Activating <bold>Synonyms</bold> will enable a wide coverage for the input search field. <break/>A keyword alternatives will be looked for when Synonyms is enabed.
